title: When you gank, and you get the kill, laners be like

replies.body: When you're playing {{champion:119}} jungle and you don't get the kill with 200 stacks

I played a game with Lee Sin jungle who at 20 minutes had 95% of our team kills.
Fortunately enemy team was so stupid they let us stale the match to 50+ minute and we won.

But holy shit. Why to win at 20, when you can take all kills and nearly cause your team to lose?

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oEPMLlee,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-07-23T18:17:36.889+0000)
>
> I played a game with Lee Sin jungle who at 20 minutes had 95% of our team kills.
> Fortunately enemy team was so stupid they let us stale the match to 50+ minute and we won.
> 
> But holy shit. Why to win at 20, when you can take all kills and nearly cause your team to lose?

Well if you are getting so fed I suggest you get a more carry build if possible.

The point is it's still just Lee Sin aganist their whole team.

Like mid, top and bot are all 1/5/5 or close, meanwhile Lee is 15/2/0.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=oEPMLlee,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-07-23T20:07:41.343+0000)
>
> The point is it's still just Lee Sin aganist their whole team.
> 
> Like mid, top and bot are all 1/5/5 or close, meanwhile Lee is 15/2/0.

If your jungler is getting fed, you should still be getting an advantage in lane simply by denying your opponent CS. Not sure how you can go 1/5 in that situation.

Let's see.
I'm in a 1v1 aganist my opponent.
When I'm about to kill him, my jungler strolls in and uses Smite on that dude.

I'm OOM with nearly no health so I can't stay, because I'm free food and my great jungler refuses to at least push the lane.

Recall takes 8 seconds and restoring health and mana from near-0 to full another 10. Add another few seconds to actually move from the middle of a lane to the tower.

Outcome: the guy who just got killed gets to the lane twice as fast, because death timers are so short early.

Oh, and he most likely have 3 waves worth of minion right outside his tower to farm uninterrupted.
you know I see you on a lot of posts. you seem like such an angry person.

So you responded to the one in which I'm not angry, just stating facts?

Ayy lmao

I actually want my jungler to get the kill.

A jungler on the field with kills means more "moveable" gold, because while are going to be sitting in your lane for the first 10-20 minutes, other then for dragon,. the jungler is moving, effectively moving where that gold is currently. A strong, fed jungler can make the enemy jungler not want to gank because of the risk of a counter gank ending with him getting further behind, and a jungler with kills that is ganking is better than a Garen getting the kill, or a non-hyper carry getting the gold.

As long as your team gets the kill, you have more global presence, more gold actively on the map, and your team still gets the gold for the kill, and the assist money. A kill is money, money is an advantage, an advantage is pressure. Pressure and morale win games.
This is why I can't stand giving up top lane.  I don't ask for ganks, I ask if my jungler would like a kill.

LOL
so true
I'll gank a 2/0 lane and get the kill and their like "gg jungler retarded ks bg report"

{{champion:11}} 

Then they start worshipping you because you use that gold to get quadra after quadra and hard carry the team.
